text: The 14th Johor State election was held on 9 May 2018. The previous state election was held on 5 May 2013. The state assemblymen is elected to 5 years term each. The Johor State Legislative Assembly would automatically dissolve on 20 June 2018, the fifth anniversary of the first sitting, and elections must be held within sixty days (two months) of the dissolution (on or before 20 August 2018, with the date to be decided by the Election Commission), unless dissolved prior to that date by the Head of State (Sultan of Johor) on the advice of the Head of Government (Menteri Besar of Johor). ==Contenders== Barisan Nasional (BN) is set to contest all 56 seats in Johor State Legislative Assembly. Barisan Nasional (BN) linchpin party United Malays National Organisation (UNMO) is to set to contest major share of Barisan Nasional (BN) seats. Pakatan Harapan have decided to contest all 56 seats in Johor. Malaysian United Indigenous Party (Bersatu) will contest in 18 seats while the Democratic Action Party (DAP) will have 14 seats. People's Justice Party (PKR) and the National Trust Party (Amanah) will contest 12 seats each.Analisis agihan kerusi HARAPAN di Johor Pan-Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS) will compete for 40 seats.Pas Johor bakal tanding 17 kerusi Parlimen, 40 DUN === Political parties === {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" |Coalition |- !Incumbent ! colspan="2" |Opposition |- |Barisan Nasional (BN) |50x50px Pakatan Harapan (PH) |Gagasan Sejahtera (GS) |- | * 45x45px United Malays National Organisation (UMNO) * Parti Gerakan Rakyat Malaysia (Gerakan) * 45x45px Malaysian Chinese Association (MCA) * 45x45px Malaysian Indian Congress (MIC) | * 50x50px Malaysian United Indigenous Party (Bersatu) * 50x50px Democratic Action Party (DAP) * 50x50px People's Justice Party (PKR) * 50x50px National Trust Party (Amanah) | * 45x45px Malaysian Islamic Party (PAS) |} ==The contested seats== {| class="wikitable" ! rowspan="3" |No. ! rowspan="3" |State constituency ! rowspan="3" |Incumbent State Assemblyman ! colspan="8" |Political parties |- !colspan="2" | Barisan Nasional Senarai Calon PRU14 BN Johor !colspan="2" |50x50px Pakatan Harapan Amanah Johor umum 13 calon bertandingBerikut adalah senarai calon PPBM Johor !colspan="2" |40x40px Gagasan Sejahtera PRU14: Senarai calon PAS Johor !colspan="2" |Other parties/Ind |- |Candidate Name |Party |Candidate Name |Party |Candidate Name |Party |Candidate Name |Party |- |N01 |Buloh Kasap |Norshida Ibrahim (BN) |Zahari Sarip |UMNO |Norsamsu Mohd.
